ModMetaData.name: Almighty Achievement Duck
ModMetaData.author: Arquebus
ModMetaData.description:
Almighty achievement duck adds a single item to the game; the titular almighty achievement duck, a true endgame challenge in a rubber duck disguise. Crafted at a crafting spot and requiring one of almost every item in the game, both gathering the ingredients and actually crafting the duck will test your sanity as a player.

The crafting recipe for the duck scales with your modlist and is configurable in the mod's settings for maximum compatibility.

Those who are actually achieve their labours, will be rewarded with a beautiful relic, the almighty rubber duck, capable of triggering a custom game ending and installable in ideology (if you own it) reliquaries.
